name: Derez [Infinite]
description:
Avoid the pixel monsters, and grab the Upres arrows to keep yourself in definition.

**Hard** and **WTF** Difficulty have score bonuses.

Derez [infinite] is a simple running-cannabalt-style game. It was my first game, originally published in Gamejolt in 2013.  https://gamejolt.com/games/derez-infinite/17498
